sentences.en: Daily facial exercises help her to retain the skin's elasticity.
sentences.cn: 每天做面部运动帮助她保持皮肤弹性。

sentences.en: Ellery's return will help to chase away some of the gloom.
sentences.cn: 埃勒里的归来可以驱散一些抑郁的情绪。

sentences.en: Four of them had gone off to find help.
sentences.cn: 他们中的4个人去寻求帮助了。

sentences.en: He can't help thinking it's all just "pie in the sky" talk.
sentences.cn: 他禁不住想所有这些不过是“画饼充饥”的空话而已。

sentences.en: Help yourself to the cookies.
sentences.cn: 请随便吃点点心吧

sentences.en: Here are a few pointers to help you make a choice.
sentences.cn: 这儿有几条帮助作出选择的建议。

sentences.en: I'll be only too pleased to help them out with any queries.
sentences.cn: 我非常乐意为他们答疑解惑。

sentences.en: I'm a practicing physician trying to help people here and now.
sentences.cn: 我是一名此时此刻只想治病救人的执业医师。

sentences.en: If there’s anything I can do to help, just give me a call.
sentences.cn: 如果需要我帮忙，就给我打个电话。

sentences.en: It is a Cinderella of charities, and needs more help.
sentences.cn: 这个慈善机构得到的关注太少了，需要更多的帮助。

sentences.en: Loans were extended to help pay the interest on the old ones.
sentences.cn: 这些贷款延期偿还以支付旧账利息。

sentences.en: she was always ready to lend a helping hand.
sentences.cn: 她总是乐于伸出援助之手。

sentences.en: Sheila had an ulterior motive for trying to help Stan.
sentences.cn: 希拉想帮助斯坦是另有所图的。

sentences.en: Thank you for all your help.
sentences.cn: 感谢你的一切帮助。

sentences.en: The situation is long past the stage when anyone's advice would help.
sentences.cn: 情况早变了，不是谁提个建议就能补救的事儿。

sentences.en: The thief helped himself to our family silver.
sentences.cn: 小偷窃取了我家的银子

sentences.en: They will be there to help if you get stuck.
sentences.cn: 如果你遇到难题的话他们会帮助你。

sentences.en: This may help to undermine the brittle truce that currently exists.
sentences.cn: 这也许会火上浇油，破坏当前脆弱不稳的休战局面。

sentences.en: You may feel unworthy of the attention and help people offer you.
sentences.cn: 你可能会觉得自己不值得别人关心和帮助。

sentences.en: Zip drives help people to organise their important information.
sentences.cn: 压缩磁盘驱动器有助于人们管理重要信息。
